## RequiredKeys type

Gets keys of an object which are required

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type RequiredKeys<T> = Exclude<keyof T, OptionalKeys<T>>;
```
<b>References:</b> [OptionalKeys](./types.optionalkeys.md)
